item.title: Rubbish dumped next to commercial bins, 20th January
item.description:
These bins at the entrance to the estate attract dumping. Dumping attracts rats. Dumped rubbish is ugly and horrible to walk past for residents leaving and returning home and for everyone walking through the estate.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hackney Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dead Tree needs replacing by 114 Sevenoaks Way, 20th January
item.description:
There is a dead young tree which needs removing and replacing please . I’ve reported it a few times a request a new replacement tree for ages now but the dead tree is still there looking awful amongst the other trees . I know that the tree planting season isn't until March now but this tree looks awful in our nice green area.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 116, Sevenoaks Way, St Paul's Cray, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Slippery thick black mud on St Mary’s Close corner, 20th January
item.description:
There’s thick black slippery mud in the gutter on the corner of St Mary’s Close which needs sweeping up and washing away Piease !!! I’ve reported this and the blocked drain which causes this problem for ages now so could this pleas be looked into before someone crossing the road slips .
